TLSConfig

TLSConfig

A set of configuration parameters for use by a TLSSocket or a TLSEngine.  Most parameters are optional and will be set to appropriate default values for most use.

Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
